item.title: Remote Work Lessons
item.description: After years of remote work, I’ve learned valuable lessons about productivity, balance, and staying connected in a distributed environment. Setting Boundaries Working from home blurs the line between personal and professional life. Key strategies: Dedicated workspace: Even if it’s just a corner of a room Set hours: Start and stop at consistent times Communicate availability: Let colleagues know when you’re working Take real breaks: Step away from the screen regularly Staying Productive Remote productivity requires intentionality:
